cascade.text: now hearing 148 passengers + crew on board the #a320 that has crashed in southern french alps. #germanwings flight. @bbcworld
@LucyHockingsBBC @bbcnewsjapan @BBCWorld おとといＡ３２０に乗ったばかりだ。
@LucyHockingsBBC @BBCWorld we are just "crew" to you??? Four flight attendants & two pilots all with families & friends. WE COUNT, TOO!
